ygData.subject: RE: Archery
ygData.msgSnippet: To my knowledge there is no archery range in-game.  The skill must be increased by using it. When I was level 5 I put 14 training points into archery.  I then
ygData.messageBody:
To my knowledge there is no archery range in-game. The skill must be
increased by using it.

When I was level 5 I put 14 training points into archery. I then used
archery as my first strike against all opponents and continue to do so each
time I level until my archery is maxed. I am now a level 11 ranger and my
archery skill maxed at 60 before I reached the first bubble toward level 12,
so I know this method works.

With a good "jump start" archery will max each level with use.

Flann
Cazik-Thule

>Subject: RE: [EQ_Fletchers] Archery
>Date: Mon, 19 Jul 1999 10:56:00 PDT

>From: "kale usi" <kaleusi@...>
>
>Was wondering if anyone knows of an archery range (in game) or such where
>one can go and work up your archery skills. I've currently used over 200
>arrows, and have barely made a 5 skill level in archery. Also, does anyone
>know where to find/buy steel and/or ceramic items for fletching/bowyering?
>
